characters: The scene shows a busy urban intersection with multiple vehicles, pedestrians, and cyclists. A cyclist wearing a brown jacket and black pants is visible on the right side of the frame. Other pedestrians are present on the sidewalks. Several cars and motorcycles are also visible in the intersection and on the surrounding roads.
summary: The vehicle approaches an intersection. A cyclist on the right side of the frame suddenly enters the driver's path. The cyclist collides with the vehicle.
actions: The vehicle is approaching an intersection at a moderate speed. The driver likely intends to proceed straight through the intersection. The vehicle does not appear to be slowing down initially, possibly because the cyclist was not visible until the last moment. The vehicle then collides with the cyclist.
key_objects: 1) Right: Cyclist, medium distance, suddenly enters the driver's path, causing a collision. 2) Right: Buildings, medium distance, partially obstruct the view of the cyclist until the last moment.
